statements: UPDATE event_attendance SET attendee_age = 30, attendee_gender = 'Male' WHERE event_id = 1 AND attendee_id = 101;
UPDATE event_attendance SET attendee_location = 'New York', attendee_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE event_name = 'Conference' AND attendee_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE event_attendance SET attendee_location = 'New York' WHERE event_id = 100 AND attendee_id = 200;
UPDATE event_attendance SET attendee_age = 30, attendee_gender = 'Male' WHERE attendee_name = 'John Doe' AND attendee_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
UPDATE EventAttendance SET attendance_status = 'Attended', check_in_time = '2022-10-10 09:00:00' WHERE event_id = 1001
UPDATE DemographicInformation SET first_name = 'Alice', email_address = 'alice@example.com', age = 30 WHERE attendee_id = 2001
UPDATE EventAttendance SET attendance_status = 'Present', check_in_time = '2022-10-15 09:30:00', check_out_time = '2022-10-15 17:00:00' WHERE event_id = 101 AND attendee_id = 201;
UPDATE DemographicInformation SET age = 35, email_address = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE attendee_id = 201;
UPDATE event_attendance SET attendance_status = TRUE WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE demographic_information SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE attendee_id = 101;
UPDATE event_attendance SET attendance_status = true WHERE event_id = 1001 AND attendee_id = 2001;
UPDATE demographic_information SET age = 30, gender = 'Female', email = 'example@email.com' WHERE attendee_id = 2001;
UPDATE events SET event_name = 'Conference 2022' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE attendees SET gender = 'F' WHERE attendee_id = 3;
UPDATE events SET event_name = 'Summer Concert', event_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE attendees SET attendee_name = 'Alice', age = 28, gender = 'F', occupation = 'Software Engineer' WHERE attendee_id = 101;
UPDATE event_attendance SET attendee_name = 'Alice' WHERE attendee_id = 1;
UPDATE event_feedback SET rating = 5, feedback_text = 'Great event!' WHERE event_id = 1 AND attendee_id = 1;
UPDATE event_attendance SET attendee_name='John Doe', event_name='Conference A' WHERE event_id=1 AND attendee_id=101;
UPDATE event_demographics SET age=35, city='New York', occupation='Engineer' WHERE attendee_id=101;
